text: Máximo Paz (April 15, 1851 – November 7, 1931) was an Argentine politician who served as Senator, Deputy and Governor of the Province of Buenos Aires. He was born in Buenos Aires, the son of Marcos Paz and Micaela Cascallares, belonging to a family of Argentine politicians from Tucumán. He was married to Georgina Kent, a distinguished lady of English descent. == References == == External links == *Argentina, Capital Federal, Census, 1855 *Bautismos 1850-1860 Category:1851 births Category:1931 deaths Category:Governors of Buenos Aires Province Category:People from Buenos Aires Category:Burials at La Recoleta Cemetery
title: Máximo Paz
